name: Sexy Woods
description:
Controls:
Arrow Keys: Move
Z: Interact

Welcome to Sexy Woods! ...It's a working title!

I'm making? a parody furry adventure title, using the very friendly GB Studio. This is software that lets you create real working Game Boy games.

The game so far is extremely early prototype phase. Most sprites are default so far, although I did change the font to include new characters (and italics), and I sprited the buildings myself, divided up into tiny 8x8 chunks.

Enjoy this absolute goofiness!
